item.title: Azure Data lake store java
item.description: Community Resources Resource Link source https://github.com/Azure/azure-data-lake-store-java/blob/ed5d6304783286c3cfff0a1dee457a922e23ad48/CHANGES.md#version-2310 Community Notes Source Note NCSC-NL Fix has been made to upgrade log4j-core. But this dependency has scope ‘test’ meaning it is not part of the final product/artifact. So there’s no risk for end users here. Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-14 10:05:44 NCSC-NL Updated communityNotVulnerable.
